Academics

My resume (updated: June 2014) can be found here.

At Georgia Tech, I am currently pursuing my Masters Degree in Computer Science at the College of Computing. My interests lie chiefly in Networked Distributed Systems. I also work with Prof. Nick Feamster on research in analysing performance bottlenecks in broadband home networks.
